features: Includes 1 bottle (12 fluid ounce) of Vagisil Peach Blossom Scentsitive Scents daily intimate vaginal wash
All over body wash will help you feel and smell fresh all day long. Light and fruity skin friendly scent.
Formulated with Vitamin E to soothe and nourish intimate skin and help you feel fresh.
Dye-Free, hypoallergenic formula. No parabens or MIT. Gynecologist and clinically tested.
Available in 5 Scentsitive Scents: Peach blossom, white jasmine, spring lilac, Rose all day, Cucumber magnolia
body.description: Did you know that lack of hydration is one of the reasons why skin becomes sensitive and irritated? Your intimate skin is delicate to begin with, so getting the right balance of moisture can make a big difference. Thats why we developed Sensitive Plus Vaginal Wash infused with the scent of Peach Blossom that is gentle on delicate skin. This vaginal wash gives sensitive skin the moisture balance it needs and gently cleanses PLUS soothes, moisturizes & helps protect sensitive intimate skin. Dermatologist & Gynecologist Tested.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Love scents, but have sensitive skin? Vagisil Scentsitive Scents are here! Gentle scents blended in our specially formulated hypoallergenic & pH balanced wash. For a mild, all-over cleansing experience that your most delicate skin and your senses will love.

5 Gentle Scents Allergen-free scent ingredients are the key to creating 5 skin-friendly scents to delight your senses as you cleanse delicate intimate skin and indulge all over. No old-school fragrance fears here. Peach Blossom Delightfully invigorating, this light, fruity scent is both gentle & reviving for a sweet & refreshing shower moment that leaves you feeling clean and confident all day. Hypoallergenic & pH balanced. SHOP White Jasmine Alluring and long-blooming, white jasmine scent helps you feel fresh all day long. With vitamin E, this wash leaves your skin soft and silky from head to toe. Hypoallergenic & pH balanced. SHOP Spring Lilac Irresistibly sweet and floral, this wash will fill your shower with the first scents of spring as it awakens your senses and helps you feel fresh all day long. Hypoallergenic & pH balanced. SHOP Cucumber Magnolia Let the scent of cool cucumber and sweet magnolia awaken your senses. Formulated with bamboo water, this wash turns your shower into a chill space where you can recharge. Hypoallergenic & pH balanced. SHOP Rosé All Day Indulge in the light bubbly bouquet of this rose scented wash. With Provitamin B5, this wash helps skin to feel soft, smooth & healthy. Your whole body will say “Cheers!” Hypoallergenic & pH balanced. SHOP

One wash for head to toe — and your vulva, too. 80% of women use a regular body wash with fragrance to cleanse all-over — including their vulva. But not all body washes are formulated at the appropriate pH range for the vulvar area. Fact is, all Vagisil washes are pH balanced at 4.5-5.5 to help maintain a healthy vulvar pH. Tested by board certified Gynecologists and Dermatologists, these washes have been shown to be gentle enough for your intimate area and all over. So, you can feel good using Scentsitive Scents as your one-and-only wash.

Tested by docs and trusted by women For almost 50 years, Vagisil has developed leading intimate care products using empathy and expertise to ensure they address women's needs. Our treatments and daily care products are gynecologist and dermatologist tested for safety and efficacy. They're made in FDA-registered labs and manufacturing facilities and meet the highest quality standards. We're constantly connecting with consumers who use our products to ensure they're feeling happy, healthy, and satisfied.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great as allover bodywash/
reviews.reviewText: I like this product as a multi-use body wash. It lathers nicely and rinses off well. I feel really clean. It indeed neutralizes body odor and keeps me fresh .I use it daily. It has a very light clean scent not overpowering. Great value for money. Its a good product ladies try it!

reviews.reviewText: It’s different scented compared with original ones.

reviews.reviewText: This is great for those of us that are sensitive and can only use certain types of products in our private areas. Lasts all day when I use it with the spray

Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It smells amazing, it's like a shampoo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m absolutely fanatical about my personal hygiene to the point that I often get sore due to disturbing my PH balance with over washing etc. This is ideal for someone like me as it protects your PH balance whilst leaving you clean and fresh. It smells beautiful and lathers really well so it’s also ideal for intimate shaving. I’d recommend it to anyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried Vagisil Scentsitive Wash Peach Blossom, and I must say it was a pleasant surprise. Peach Blossom scent is lovely without being overpowering. It leaves a subtle, pleasant fragrance that doesn't feel artificial or too strong, which is a big plus for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: I do not recommend for intimate whashing
reviews.reviewText: I do not recommend for intimate it has a perfume. It turned everything upside down

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm a big fan of using feminine products due to me being allergic to many ingredients which tends to irritate me, so I was surprised to find out that Vagisil actually sells a huge variety of washes for our girly sensitive bits. When the product arrived I was surprised with how big the bottle was. Great value for money. The smell is divine but most importantly I felt super fresh all day long even though it had been a very sunny day. I'd definitely be buying some other scented vagisil wash once I need it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised at how much product you get for the price and you only need to use a small ammount, so it should last quite a while, the scent isn't too strong and the consistency is like shower gel. After using I was worried I might feel irritation, but if anything I felt soothed. This is now part of my daily shower routine. I have been trying to use products that have less parabens in, so I am really pleased that vagisil dosn't have any in this.
